public.view.index.title: CGC TRADE CO.!
public.view.home.sbDesc: Sihirli Balık 'Killifish Breeding Kit', is an educational kit provides you the chance to give birth, breed and raise your fresh water creatures named Killifish.  You can observe these beautiful and colorful Killifishes from their eggs biological progress to their birth, from their baby stage to adult stage with our kit.
public.view.home.yfDesc: Yaşayan Fosil 'Alive Fossil Breeding Kit', is an educational kit that provides you the chance to give birth, breed and raise fresh water creatures named Triops.  You can observe these ancient creatures eggs from their biological development to their birth, from their baby stage to adult stage with our kit.
public.view.home.wowPawDesc: Extra durable beds from soft fabrics, with lots of natural color preferences
public.view.home.snowhiteProductsDesc: Natural aquarium, reptile and bird sands
public.view.wowpawDesc: Extra durable fabrics, waterproof specialty, natural color preferences with multiple size and styles
public.view.snowhite.Desc: Natural Aquarium Sands and Bird Minerals
public.view.snowhite.sandDesc1: Snowhite is a natural sand that contains calcium.Is is pure white in colour. The calcium and carbonate content buffers water hardness. For healthy livestock maintains the PH value between 8.0-8.5
public.view.snowhite.sandDesc2: Snowhite sand has no synthetic content and is not chemically treated. %100 Pure calcium carbonate does not contain toxic substances or heavy metals. Creates optimum habitats for denitrification and nitrification bacteria and helps water to keep clean.
public.view.snowhite.sandDesc3: Especially produced for aquarium use. Sand particles are not sharp, keen or angular. Does not cause harm to any aquarium inhibitants. It’s opacity feature enables photosynthetic organisms like corals to have more healthy and vivid colours.
public.view.snowhite.aquaDesc1: Snowhite premium bird sand includes every mineral your bird needs. Most bird foods are weak of calcium, iron and magnesium witch disables them to produce hard shelled and healthy eggs. Snowhite sand helps your birds immune system, minimizes baby bird deaths, helps feathers stay healthy and colorful.
public.view.snowhite.aquaDesc2: Can be used for all kinds of birds
public.view.snowhite.Desc2: Snowhite Akvaryum kumları 900Gr. lık ambalajlarında veya 7Kg lik kovalarda satılmaktadır.
